DialogueText.Text: Have you had any luck in snatching a Dragon Bone?

Oh my! What a marvel! A truly legendary artifact! To think, the Selenic Order has the entire remains of a Dragon beneath their lair... Thank you once again for the help; with this, we have everything needed for the ritual! I'll need some time to finish preparing for the ritual, but I'll notify you once we're ready. I can taste our victory over the Selenic Order just over the horizon.

I know the Selenic Order keeps a tight watch over the lower levels of their hideout, and the Orator himself prevents entry while he's present. You'll need to sneak in when it isn't under such protection.
